text:
Hi, tera jo about hai wo perfectly suit hota hai tereko. Tu insaan hai hi "Khush raho aur Maje karo" type ka. Tereko kabhi maine udaas ya phir tension mai nahi dekha (Tension ho to bhi tune kabhi dikhayi nahi ig). Ha bs kabhi kabhi gussa ho jata tha(Gussa nikalne ke liye bc mai hi mila tha kyağŸ˜’)  aur wo gussa chala bhi jata tha jaldi.Bs aise hi tension free aur haste rehna.
Tum as a roomie bhi bahut acche the. Kabhi mereko kuch complain nahi ki kisi cheez ke baare mai. First year mai yaad hi hoga mai sota rehta tha aur tum  HSS ka lecture krke aate the aur mereko tum ya Dinesh lab k liye uthate the (Thanks for thatâ˜ºï¸). 
Teri wajah se mera campus ka stay bhi bahut memorable ho gya. Wo mess mai khana khame ke baad wale random discussions ho ya phir movies dekhna ho sb yaad aata hai. 
Travel aur sports ke liye to group mai tu hi sabse jyada enthusiast tha. Wo alag baat hai ki maine bahut baar naa bolke uss enthu ko khtm kr diyağŸ˜Œ . Wo Delhi trip bhi bahut memorable thi uss time bhale hi baarish aa gyi ho pr friends k saath wo bhi accha laga tha (Yha teri financial planning bahut commendable thiğŸ‘Œ).  Uske baad Bithoor wali trip, usme to jaate time hi itne jyada thak gye ki aate time seedha campus aa gya mai pr teri energy k kya kehne,  wo 30 km mai aur 10 kms cycling karke aur Iskon temple dekhne chala gya.
Sports mai to meri yhi khwaish thi ki Table Tennis aur Squash mai kabhi to tereko harau. Table Tennis mai maine tereko hara diya pr Squash mai khwaish jo thi wo khwaish hi reh gyiğŸ˜”. Pr Squash mai jo tune mereko daudaya hai, wo to kabhi na kabhi tereko returen karoonga, be assured!
 

Teri jo bhi 'Chahat' hai wo thumhe jaldi mil jayeğŸ˜.
author: Shinde Sujeetkumar Ulhas

text:
Hi, tera jo about hai wo perfectly suit hota hai tereko. Tu insaan hai hi "Khush raho aur Maje karo" type ka. Tereko kabhi maine udaas ya phir tension mai nahi dekha (Tension ho to bhi tune kabhi dikhayi nahi ig). Ha bs kabhi kabhi gussa ho jata tha(Gussa nikalne ke liye bc mai hi mila tha kyağŸ˜’)  aur wo gussa chala bhi jata tha jaldi. Bs aise hi tension free aur haste rehna.
Tum as a roomie bhi bahut acche the. Kabhi mereko kuch complain nahi ki kisi cheez ke baare mai. First year mai yaad hi hoga mai sota rehta tha aur tum  HSS ka lecture krke aate the aur mereko tum ya Dinesh lab k liye uthate the (Thanks for thatâ˜ºï¸). 
Teri wajah se mera campus ka stay bhi bahut memorable ho gya. Wo mess mai khana khame ke baad wale random discussions ho ya phir movies dekhna ho sb yaad aata hai. 
Travel aur sports ke liye to group mai tu hi sabse jyada enthusiast tha. Wo alag baat hai ki maine bahut baar naa bolke uss enthu ko khtm kr diyağŸ˜Œ . Wo Delhi trip bhi bahut memorable thi uss time bhale hi baarish aa gyi ho pr friends k saath wo bhi accha laga tha (Yha teri financial planning bahut commendable thiğŸ‘Œ).  Uske baad Bithoor wali trip, usme to jaate time hi itne jyada thak gye ki aate time seedha campus aa gya mai pr teri energy k kya kehne,  wo 30 km mai aur 10 kms cycling karke aur Iskon temple dekhne chala gya. Baki Z Square mai McD wale burgers abhi bhi yaad hai mereko. Kabhi chalenge phir se khane kisi McD maiğŸ˜‹.
Sports mai to meri yhi khwaish thi ki Table Tennis aur Squash mai kabhi to tereko harau. Table Tennis mai maine tereko hara diya pr Squash mai khwaish jo thi wo khwaish hi reh gyiğŸ˜”. Pr Squash mai jo tune mereko daudaya hai, wo to kabhi na kabhi tereko return karoonga, be assured!
Ye to pakka hai ki gaali dene mai tu peeche reh gyağŸ˜. Mere liye mann mai itni gaaliya hongi pr tere 'Sanskars' ki wajah se kabhi muh se bahar nhi nikliğŸ˜‚.
In the end yhi kahoonga ki jaisa down to earth abhi hai, humesha waise hi rehna aur chaapte rehna.
Aur I hope ki teri jo bhi 'Chahat' hai wo jaldi poori ho jayeğŸ˜ aur thumhe bahut saare paise mil jayeğŸ˜‰.
Milte rahenge! All the best!
author: Shinde Sujeetkumar Ulhas
